statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales_data;
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT sale_date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY sale_date;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 5 AND revenue < 500;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity IN (10, 20, 30);
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01' AND revenue > 1000
SELECT product_name, SUM(revenue) FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING SUM(revenue) > 5000
SELECT sale_id, product_name, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE quantity >= 10 AND revenue < 500
SELECT MAX(revenue) FROM sales_data
SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM sales_data
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales_data
SELECT product_name, AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY avg_revenue DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM sales_data
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%phone%'
SELECT sale_date, SUM(revenue) FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY sale_date
SELECT sale_id, product_name, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-15'
SELECT AVG(revenue) FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity = (SELECT MAX(quantity) FROM sales_data)
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > (SELECT AVG(revenue) FROM sales_data)
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = (SELECT MAX(sale_date) FROM sales_data)
SELECT AVG(revenue) FROM sales_data WHERE product_name = 'Laptop'
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_name IN ('Phone', 'Tablet')
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, revenue * quantity AS total_sales FROM sales_data
SELECT * FROM hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, city, country FROM hotels WHERE country='USA';
SELECT hotel_name, revenue FROM hotels WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE hotel_id=1;
SELECT guest_name, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM hotels;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_bookings FROM bookings;
SELECT hotel_name, SUM(total_amount) as total_revenue FROM bookings GROUP BY hotel_name;
SELECT * FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id;
SELECT * FROM hotels LEFT JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id;
SELECT * FROM hotels RIGHT JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id;
SELECT * FROM hotels INNER JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, AVG(revenue) as avg_revenue FROM hotels GROUP BY hotel_name HAVING AVG(revenue) > 5000;
SELECT guest_name, SUM(total_amount) as total_spent FROM bookings GROUP BY guest_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) as total_hotels FROM hotels GROUP BY city ORDER BY total_hotels DESC;
SELECT MAX(revenue) as max_revenue FROM hotels;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM hotels ORDER BY country ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE hotel_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE hotel_name LIKE '%Marriott%';
SELECT hotel_name, city, country, revenue FROM hotels WHERE revenue > 100000
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT hotel_name, city, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE total_amount > 500
SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, city, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id WHERE city = 'London'
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT hotel_name, city, SUM(total_amount) AS total_revenue FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_name, city HAVING total_revenue > 50000

SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, city, country, SUM(total_amount) AS total_booking_amount FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_id, hotel_name, city, country ORDER BY total_booking_amount DESC
SELECT hotel_name, city, country, revenue FROM hotels WHERE revenue < 50000 ORDER BY revenue ASC
SELECT hotel_name, city, country, revenue FROM hotels WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE guest_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT hotel_name, city, country, revenue FROM hotels WHERE revenue BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM bookings
SELECT city, COUNT(*) AS total_hotels FROM hotels GROUP BY city ORDER BY total_hotels DESC
SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, city, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id WHERE check_out_date > '2022-06-30'
SELECT hotel_name, city, country, MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM hotels GROUP BY hotel_name, city, country ORDER BY max_revenue DESC
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE check_out_date < '2022-12-31'

SELECT hotel_name, city, country, SUM(total_amount) AS total_booking_amount FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id GROUP BY hotel_name, city, country HAVING total_booking_amount < 100000
SELECT hotel_name, city, country, AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue FROM hotels GROUP BY hotel_name, city, country HAVING avg_revenue > 60000
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE total_amount < 1000
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT firm_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM revenue_data;
SELECT firm_name, revenue_amount FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(revenue_amount) AS max_revenue FROM revenue_data;
SELECT * FROM trends_data;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends_data WHERE trend_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_trends FROM trends_data;
SELECT firm_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(revenue_amount) AS avg_revenue FROM revenue_data;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name FROM trends_data WHERE trend_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale FROM sales_data;
SELECT firm_name, revenue_amount FROM revenue_data ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM trends_data ORDER BY trend_date;
SELECT DISTINCT firm_name FROM sales_data;
SELECT DISTINCT firm_name FROM revenue_data;
SELECT DISTINCT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE firm_name = 'ABC Corp' AND sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_date = (SELECT MAX(revenue_date) FROM revenue_data);
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT firm_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data WHERE firm_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT firm_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales_amount FROM sales_data GROUP BY firm_name;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends_data WHERE trend_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT DISTINCT firm_name FROM sales_data;
SELECT MAX(revenue_amount) AS max_revenue FROM revenue_data;
SELECT MIN(sale_amount) AS min_sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(revenue_amount) AS average_revenue FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT firm_name, COUNT(*) AS total_revenues FROM revenue_data GROUP BY firm_name HAVING total_revenues > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT trend_name FROM trends_data WHERE trend_description LIKE '%analysis%';
SELECT firm_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 5000 AND sale_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT firm_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue_amount FROM revenue_data GROUP BY firm_name HAVING total_revenue_amount > 10000;
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount, AVG(revenue_amount) AS avg_revenue_amount FROM sales_data INNER JOIN revenue_data ON sales_data.firm_name = revenue_data.firm_name;
SELECT * FROM sales_data JOIN trends_data ON sales_data.firm_name = trends_data.trend_name;
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) AS total_trends FROM trends_data WHERE trend_id IN (SELECT trend_id FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 2000);
SELECT firm_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = (SELECT MAX(sale_date) FROM sales_data);
SELECT firm_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' GROUP BY firm_name;
SELECT AVG(revenue_amount) AS average_revenue FROM revenue_data WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2021-04-01' AND '2021-07-01';
SELECT * FROM hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotels;
SELECT hotel_name, hotel_rating FROM hotels WHERE hotel_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT hotel_name, booking_date FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount < 500;
SELECT hotel_name, location, total_amount FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT booking_id, sale_date FROM bookings JOIN sales ON bookings.booking_id = sales.booking_id;
SELECT hotel_name, location, hotel_rating, total_amount FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT hotel_name, booking_date, total_amount, sale_amount FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id JOIN sales ON bookings.booking_id = sales.booking_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email NOT LIKE '%yahoo.com';
SELECT hotel_name, location, total_amount, sale_amount FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id JOIN sales ON bookings.booking_id = sales.booking_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT booking_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM bookings JOIN sales ON bookings.booking_id = sales.booking_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT hotel_name, location, customer_name, email FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id JOIN sales ON bookings.booking_id = sales.booking_id JOIN customers ON sales.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotels;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT hotel_name, hotel_rating, location FROM hotels WHERE hotel_rating > 4;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT hotel_name, location, hotel_rating FROM hotels WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT hotel_name, hotel_rating FROM hotels WHERE hotel_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotels WHERE hotel_id IN (SELECT hotel_id FROM bookings);
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM bookings);
SELECT hotel_name, location, hotel_rating FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers JOIN bookings ON customers.customer_id = bookings.hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_name, location, total_amount FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email, booking_date FROM customers JOIN bookings ON customers.customer_id = bookings.hotel_id WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT hotel_name, location, hotel_rating, booking_date FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id WHERE booking_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, total_amount FROM customers JOIN bookings ON customers.customer_id = bookings.hotel_id WHERE total_amount < 500;
SELECT hotel_name, location, hotel_rating, total_amount FROM hotels JOIN bookings ON hotels.hotel_id = bookings.hotel_id WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, booking_date FROM customers JOIN bookings ON customers.customer_id = bookings.hotel_id WHERE booking_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT hotel_name, location, hotel_rating, sale_amount FROM hotels JOIN sales ON hotels.hotel_id = sales.booking_id WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, sale_date FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.booking_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT sale_date, revenue FROM sales;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM sales_report;
SELECT sale_id, report_date, total_revenue FROM sales_report;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, revenue FROM sales WHERE sale_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, total_revenue FROM sales_report WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, revenue FROM sales LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_report WHERE total_revenue >= 500;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1 AND product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sales JOIN customers ON sales.sale_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN products ON customers.customer_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, revenue, total_revenue FROM customers JOIN sales_report ON customers.customer_id = sales_report.sale_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_revenue FROM sales JOIN sales_report ON sales.sale_id = sales_report.sale_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, revenue FROM sales WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_revenue FROM sales_report WHERE total_revenue < 5000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%';
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, revenue FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, email, total_revenue FROM customers JOIN sales_report ON customers.customer_id = sales_report.sale_id WHERE total_revenue > 3000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price >= 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM customers JOIN sales_report ON customers.customer_id = sales_report.sale_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM customers JOIN sales_report ON customers.customer_id = sales_report.sale_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT product_id, product_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY product_id, product_name HAVING AVG(price) > 50;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
